abstract: Conversational agents are increasingly used in healthcare, with Large Language Models (LLMs) significantly enhancing their capabilities. When integrated into social robots, LLMs offer the potential for more natural interactions. However, while LLMs …

abstract: Results: Skin malignancies represented 3.56% of the oncological cases admitted from January 2018 to October 2022. The most prevalent etiological factors were sun exposure and light-colored skin (84.52%). Most cases registered discomfort due to …
